common

Interface IUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyUser, ServerUser, User

    public interface IUser
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IUser interface defines a set of operations of a user in our chatApp IUser is NOT transmitted to anyone. ONLY the STUB of this Remote object is ever transmitted.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BOUND_NAME
      The name the IUser object will be bound to in the RMI Registry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(IUser userStub)
      A method to be called by remote user for auto-connect-back
      java.util.Collection<IChatRoom> getChatRooms()
      Get all chat rooms the user has joined.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of the user.
      java.util.UUID getUUID()
      Get UUid of the user, which is a unique identifier for the user.
      <T extends IUserMessageType>
      void      		 receive(DataPacketUser<T> data)
      Receive a data packet Note that the data packet type and visitor type are both different from the chat room level communication.

    • Field Detail

      • BOUND_NAME

        static final java.lang.String BOUND_NAME
        The name the IUser object will be bound to in the RMI Registry
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the name of the user.
        Returns:
        The name of the user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

      • getUUID

        java.util.UUID getUUID()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get UUid of the user, which is a unique identifier for the user. The UUID value of the user must equals the UUID value of all receivers belonging to this user.
        Returns:
        uuid of the user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

      • getChatRooms

        java.util.Collection<IChatRoom> getChatRooms()
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get all chat rooms the user has joined.
        Returns:
        All chat rooms the user has joined
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

      • connect

        void connect(IUser userStub)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method to be called by remote user for auto-connect-back
        Parameters:
        userStub - A remote user stub
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

      • receive

        <T extends IUserMessageType> void receive(DataPacketUser<T> data)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Receive a data packet Note that the data packet type and visitor type are both different from the chat room level communication.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the data being held.
        Parameters:
        data - the received data packet
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs
